document_data.name: Guardians of Light
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Guardians of Light''' was a knightly order devoted to the goddess [[Selûne]] the Moonmaiden.

Less fanatical than the [[Swords of the Lady]], the Guardians of Light were an elite order of [[paladin]]s.

They existed during the time of the ancient empire of [[Netheril]], which fell in {{Yearlink|-339}}.
